Text: Are you still alive Whats the word England is grand though I am gone so much I wouldnt really know whats going on here Drop a note as you have time I tried to contact Emily but alas she has not returned my call must be quite busy she is Let me know if we have a connection Tobes Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp

Wo bist duSusan Great to hear from you Glad to see we have a connection What do you do for work nowdays Curiosity has me You are of course always welcome to my tiny little dormitoryflat at anytime Also I am travelling as much as possible around Europe and the former Eastern Bloc countries I am trying to find a few business opportunities etc etcso if you want something different look no further I DO have instant messenger so look me up This will be a good way to stay in touch I will be in the US from the th of Dec through the th Half the time will be spent in Houston with Cara and the other half at Christmasimagine that will be with my parents Met Cara in New York this weekend It was a grand time We wanted to see one another and we figured that NY was the best compromise for us in terms of distance availability etc Saw the devastation briefly and now I want Rudy Giuliani to run for Prez More on that later Will you be in Houston the th through the st of December Lunch perhaps Also Thanksgiving I will be here with Cara You are more than welcome at anytime now later or a few months from now OK I am rambling as I havent slept in hours thanks to the flight from NY Drop a note as you have time Best Tobin From To Subject RE Date Fri Oct TOBINi was deceased but i have arisen from the ashesHOW ARE YOU I want to hear all about the UK and how you are fairing there If i can manage it Id love to make a trip over there and see your pad etc Sorry you never managed to meet up with emily but she was actually in the US when you emailed and then only back in London for about a week to pack up and head home So you need to give me a kind of schedule for where youre going to be and whenie UK vs US for holidays and what not If you have a Messenger account let me knowid love to chat realtime with you Susan BTW Ill be in Portland midNovember for workif you happen to be home then Id love to see youotherwise any suggestions would be much welcomed Original Message From Tobin Carlson ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Subject Are you still alive Whats the word England is grand though I am gone so much I wouldnt really know whats going on here Drop a note as you have time I tried to contact Emily but alas she has not returned my call must be quite busy she is Let me know if we have a connection Tobes Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp This email is the property of Susan Are you there Drop a line as you have time I am here for the next week or so in England I was in Milan Italy for fashion week and then days later was in Portland as I picked up a priest friend from there and brought him back to England for a week holiday Thus I think I have spent more time on airlines than I have with my two feet placed on the ground How are you What are you up to Are you working or still lamenting a potential change Let me know Best to you Tobin ps I will be in Houston for the entire month of April and half of May Shall we do lunch Chat with friends online try MSN Messenger
